initResources

public void initResources()
Here you have to initialize all resources (images, fonts, sounds, ...) which you want to use in this state. The method will be called by the ResourceView and pre load all the stuff.

Specified by:
initResources in class View

initGameAndGUI

public void initGameAndGUI(GameContainer gameContainer,
                           StateBasedGame stateBasedGame)
                    throws SlickException
This method will called by Nifty to initialize itself. Usually you have to call initNifty(gameContainer, stateBasedGame) here. Call super.initGUI(gameContainer, stateBasedGame) if you need an instance of the gameContainer and/or the statedBasedGame in other methods then this.

Overrides:
initGameAndGUI in class View
Parameters:
gameContainer - The game container
stateBasedGame - A representation of the game
Throws:
SlickException
